Module main
Package com.vtuberrush.src.helpers

Class LoadSave

java.lang.Object
com.vtuberrush.src.helpers.LoadSave
public class LoadSave extends Object
This class is responsible for handling external game resources such as reading and writing level files to the system, and loading in images for the game's icon, background and asset sprites.
Version:
0.0.1-alpha.1
Author:
Gio Carlo Ciudadano

    Field
    Description
    static String
    filePath
    Defines the dynamic file path of the level file by combining homePath, saveFolder, and level.
    static String
    homePath
    Defines the dynamic home directory of the user.
    static String
    level
    Defines the name of the level file.
    static String
    saveFolder
    Defines the name of the parent folder where the level file is saved.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    createFolder()
    Creates a new folder in the home directory of the user.
    This method is called when creating a new level file.
    static void
    createLevel​(int[] idArray)
    Creates a new default level made of grass tiles, provided that the level file does not already exist.
    static BufferedImage
    getBackground()
    Loads in the background from resources which is used in the MENU and GAME OVER scenes.
    static BufferedImage
    getGameIcon()
    Loads in the game icon from resources.
    This method is called on startup when the game first creates a window.
    static BufferedImage
    getSpriteAtlas()
    Loads in a sprite atlas from resources which is used as the sprites for all tiles, projectiles, units, and enemies.
    static BufferedImage
    getUnitIconsAtlas()
    Loads in a unit icons atlas which are used as clickable buttons in the Action Bar when selecting and placing a unit.
    static ArrayList<Flag>
    readFlags​(String name)
    Reads the location of the start and end flags of the level.
    static int[][]
    readLevel​(String name)
    Converts the read file from readFile(File) into a readable level format.
    static void
    saveLevel​(String name, int[][] idArray, Flag start, Flag end)
    Converts the changes made in the built-in level editor into a written level format.

      public static String filePath
      Defines the dynamic file path of the level file by combining homePath, saveFolder, and level.

  • Method Details

    • createFolder

      public static void createFolder()
      Creates a new folder in the home directory of the user.
      This method is called when creating a new level file.

    • getGameIcon

      public static BufferedImage getGameIcon()
      Loads in the game icon from resources.
      This method is called on startup when the game first creates a window.

    • getBackground

      public static BufferedImage getBackground()
      Loads in the background from resources which is used in the MENU and GAME OVER scenes.

    • getSpriteAtlas

      public static BufferedImage getSpriteAtlas()
      Loads in a sprite atlas from resources which is used as the sprites for all tiles, projectiles, units, and enemies.

    • getUnitIconsAtlas

      public static BufferedImage getUnitIconsAtlas()
      Loads in a unit icons atlas which are used as clickable buttons in the Action Bar when selecting and placing a unit.

    • createLevel

      public static void createLevel​(int[] idArray)
      Creates a new default level made of grass tiles, provided that the level file does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      idArray - - Contains information related to which tiles are placed in the level. Defaults to a grass field if a level file does not already exist.

    • saveLevel

      public static void saveLevel​(String name, int[][] idArray, Flag start, Flag end)
      Converts the changes made in the built-in level editor into a written level format.
      Parameters:
      name - - Defines the name of the level.
      idArray - - Defines the type of tile and its location in a two-dimensional grid.
      start - - Defines the location where enemies spawn.
      end - - Defines the location where enemies are purged and lives are lost.

    • readLevel

      public static int[][] readLevel​(String name)
      Converts the read file from readFile(File) into a readable level format.
      Parameters:
      name - - Defines the name of the level.

    • readFlags

      public static ArrayList<Flag> readFlags​(String name)
      Reads the location of the start and end flags of the level.
      Parameters:
      name - - Defines the name of the level.
